testCases.label: Verify persisting a store
testCases.description: Ensures that persistStore saves a Store object, returns the saved entity, and invokes the repository's save method exactly once with no additional interactions.

testCases.label: Verify retrieving all stores
testCases.description: Checks that getAllStores returns the expected number of Store objects and that the repository's findAll method is invoked exactly once with no further interactions.

testCases.label: Verify retrieving a store by ID
testCases.description: Ensures that getStoreById returns the correct Store for a given ID and that findById is invoked exactly once with no additional interactions.

testCases.label: Verify deleting a store by ID
testCases.description: Confirms that deleteStore correctly calls deleteById once for the provided ID and performs no other repository interactions.

testCases.label: Verify updating an existing store
testCases.description: Ensures that updateStore finds a Store by ID, updates it, saves it, returns the updated Store, and invokes the repository methods findById and save exactly once with no further interactions.
